examples: I imagine she earned a lot of money with her new novel
I thought to find her in a bad state
he didn't think to find her in the kitchen
I guess she is angry at me for standing her up

results.definition: put forward, of a guess, in spite of possible refutation
examples: I am guessing that the price of real estate will rise again
I cannot pretend to say that you are wrong

results.definition: judge tentatively or form an estimate of (quantities or time)
examples: I estimate this chicken to weigh three pounds
He guessed the right number of beans in the jar and won the prize
